about_the_game:
This Digital Artbook contains 28 solo art pieces, 4 pairing art pieces, with a total of 200+ images that include over 150 variants!
This set is filled with stunning artwork that is not in-game. This product contains images ONLY. It is not the actual game.

If you liked the game, please consider buying this!

*After download, you'll find the digital artbook in your game's directory folder, accessible through -> Manage -> Browse local files

content_descriptors.notes:
This Artbook and Application package may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Girls Overboard- Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: The official digital artbook-- filled with stunning artwork and variant art from the world of Girls Overboard!
